#summary Details of the metaqc database file.

= Introduction =

The metaqc database stores all the information used to create the reports. It also stores information regarding all the compounds present in the [iQC_mix iQC mix], allowing for expansion of the reports in future.


= Structure of the database =

There are six tables in the database:
  * qc_files
  * qc_data
  * qc_testID
  * qc_results
  * qc_reports
  * pdf_loc

== Structure of tables == 
*qc_files*
|| fkey || integer || Unique row identifier ||
|| file_name || varchar || File name of the .cdf file ||
|| method_file || varchar || Method file used for that file ||
|| instr_name || varchar || The name of the instrument used ||
|| expr_date || datetime || Time stamp (run date) of the file ||

*qc_data*
|| file_name || varchar || As for qc_files ||
|| expr_date || varchar || As for qc_files ||
|| compound || varchar || Compound name ||
|| area || real || Area value ||
|| intensity || real || Intensity value ||
|| RT || real || Retention time (found) ||
|| RTdelta || real || Retention time shift vs expected ||
|| symmetry || real || Symmetry score ||

*qc_testID*
|| test_number || Test identifier (test1, test2 etc) ||
|| test_label || Short (internal) name of test ||

*qc_results*
|| file_name || varchar || As for qc_files ||
|| test1r1 || real ||  Numeric value of retention time lock test ||
|| test1r2 || varchar || Pass/Watch/Fail ||
|| test2r1 || real || Numeric value of ribitol intensity test ||
|| test2r2 || varchar || Pass/Watch/Fail ||
|| test3r1 || real || Numeric value of putrescine/ribitol ratio test ||
|| test3r2 || varchar || Pass/Watch/Fail ||
|| test4r1 || real || Numeric value of ribose intensity test ||
|| test4r2 || varchar || Pass/Watch/Fail ||
|| test5r1 || real || Numeric value of glutamate/ribose ratio test ||
|| test5r2 || varchar || Pass/Watch/Fail ||
|| test6r1 || real || Numeric value of aparagine/ribose ratio test ||
|| test6r2 || varchar || Pass/Watch/Fail ||
|| test7r1 || real || Numeric value of alanine intensity test ||
|| test7r2 || varchar || Pass/Watch/Fail ||
|| test8r1 || real || Numeric value of alanine/valine ratio test ||
|| test8r2 || varchar || Pass/Watch/Fail ||
|| test9r1 || real || Numeric value of maltotriose intensity test ||
|| test9r2 || varchar || Pass/Watch/Fail ||

*qc_reports*
|| file_name || varchar || As for qc_files ||
|| data_folder || varchar || Location of the .cdf file (directory path only) ||
|| rep_loc || varchar || Full path to .tex report file ||

*pdf_info*
|| file_name || varchar || As for qc_files ||
|| pdf_loc || varchar || Full path to .pdf report file ||
